themes_configurations.name: color_scheme
themes_configurations.label: Frontend Color Scheme
themes_configurations.description: Kingston comes with two prebuilt color schemes. Algae is a business affair, inspired by the ubiquitous blue-green algae. Reggae is for good times... red, green, and black predominating.

themes_configurations.name: sidebar_pos
themes_configurations.label: Frontend Sidebar Position
themes_configurations.description: Sidebar can be positioned left or right. Right is default. This setting only applies to the frontend.

themes_configurations.name: xar_footer
themes_configurations.label: Show Xaraya Footer
themes_configurations.description: The Xaraya footer includes a "Powered by Xaraya" icon and links to Xaraya documentation and resources.

themes_configurations.name: nav_pos
themes_configurations.label: Backend Navigation Position
themes_configurations.description: Admin navigation can be positioned top, right, or left. Left is default. "Top" provides the maximum horizontal width for content display. This setting only applies to the backend.

themes_configurations.name: xar_footer
themes_configurations.label: Show Xaraya Footer
themes_configurations.description: The Xaraya footer includes a "Powered by Xaraya" icon and links to Xaraya documentation and resources.

themes_configurations.name: font_set
themes_configurations.label: Use Custom Fonts
themes_configurations.description: Use custom fonts, as the design intends. Custom fonts work in IE4+, Opera 10+, Firefox 3.5+, Safari 3.1+, and Chrome 4.0+; that is to say, support is almost universal. However, custom fonts can be disabled to lower page load overhead.

themes_configurations.name: admin_bar
themes_configurations.label: Frontend Admin Bar
themes_configurations.description: Displays Xaraya Admin links unobtrusively at screen bottom.
